statements: UPDATE customer_behavior SET customer_name='John Doe', email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE customer_id=1;

UPDATE customer_behavior SET purchase_history='{"total_purchases": 5, "last_purchase": "2021-10-15", "average_purchase_amount": 50.00}' WHERE customer_id=2;
UPDATE customer_behavior SET customer_age = 30, customer_name = 'Alice' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE purchase_history SET total_amount = 1500.50, purchase_date = '2022-12-15' WHERE purchase_id = 100;
UPDATE customer_behavior SET customer_age = 40, customer_name = 'John Doe' WHERE customer_id = 1;

UPDATE customers SET name = 'John Doe', age = 30 WHERE customer_id = 1;

UPDATE customers SET age = 30 WHERE name = 'Alice';
UPDATE transactions SET payment_method = 'Credit Card' WHERE amount > 1000;
UPDATE customers SET age = 30, email = 'updated.email@example.com' WHERE customer_id = 1;
UPDATE purchases SET quantity = 3, purchase_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE purchase_id = 5;
UPDATE customer_demographics SET age = 35, location = 'New York' WHERE customer_id = 101;
UPDATE customer_behavior SET activity_level = 'high', purchase_history = 'Recent purchases' WHERE customer_id = 102;

UPDATE customer_behavior SET activity_level = 'High', purchase_history = 'Frequent purchases' WHERE customer_id = 54321;
